install package kubuntu-desktop in synap: then select kde session before logging in
To install the Ati/NVidia drivers for your video card, see https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BinaryDriverHowto
If you need to run graphical applications as root, use gksudo, as it will set up the environment more appropriately. Avoid ever using sudo <GUI-application>

Font installation basics here: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/FontInstallHowto - No fonts in Flash? Install msttcorefonts (from !Multiverse), gsfonts, and gsfonts-x11. No fonts in MPlayer? see !MPlayer
